scripts.postinstall: copy hacks\CMakeLists.txt node_modules\react-native-vision-camera\android && copy hacks\CameraView.kt node_modules\react-native-vision-camera\android\src\main\java\com\mrousavy\camera && echo Applied React Native Vision Camera hacks
scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:build: npm run bundle && npm run build
scripts.bundle:build:install: npm run bundle && npm run build && npm run install:android
